params.name: feature_size
params.description: The feature dimension of the extracted features.

params.name: sampling_rate
params.description: The sampling rate at which the audio files should be digitalized expressed in hertz (Hz).

params.name: padding_value
params.description: The value that is used to fill the padding vectors.

params.name: stride
params.description: Stride used to reshape audios from shape (batch_size,num_frames,num_mel_bins) to(batch_size,num_frames//stride,num_mel_bins*stride).
